channel.title: CVE Feed for WordPlus -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WordPlus -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-33142|2024-08-03T08:01:20.103Z -- wordplus -- better%20messages%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (subscriber+) Denial Of Service (DoS) vulnerability in WordPlus WordPress Better Messages plugin <= 1.9.10.57 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-29454|2024-08-03T06:26:05.159Z -- wordplus -- better%20messages%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPlus Better Messages plugin <= 1.9.9.148 at WordPress allows attackers to upload files. File attachment to messages must be activated.

item.title: CVE-2022-36389|2024-08-03T10:00:04.391Z -- wordplus -- better%20messages%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPlus Better Messages plugin <= 1.9.9.148 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-40216|2024-08-03T12:14:39.861Z -- wordplus -- better%20messages%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (subscriber+) Messaging Block Bypass vulnerability in Better Messages plugin <= 1.9.10.69 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2022-41609|2024-08-03T12:49:43.313Z -- wordplus -- better%20messages%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (subscriber+) Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Better Messages plugin 1.9.10.68 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-32802|2024-06-04T17:51:04.742Z -- wordplus -- bp%20better%20messages
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WordPlus BP Better Messages allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects BP Better Messages: from n/a through 2.4.32.

item.title: CVE-2024-32802|2024-08-02T02:20:35.514Z -- wordplus -- bp%20better%20messages
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in WordPlus BP Better Messages allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects BP Better Messages: from n/a through 2.4.32.
